OOC: I am going to ignore that and you, Benny Hillo. You mode like hellfire!

BIC: Burning hammer walks right up to Perplex.

Perplex: Now that that guy is out of the way. We go one more time...one on
one.

Burning Hammer: I plan to make you tell me where your kid is.

Perplex: He's my brother, and not even I know where he is.

Burning Hammer: You're lying! No, wait, I guess you're not, I can see it in
your eyes. Well, after I kill you, I'll keep coming back until the kid is
mine. His blood with your's!

Perplex: You are sick, and I will allow you to kill nobody!

Burning Hammer: Well let's just see about that. Enguarde!...
